body_html: @martinwicke, yes, "bazel test" by default strips out LD_LIBRARY_PATH. What I recall from before is that you have to specify --spawn_strategy=standalone or --spawn_strategy=local should fix that. If @jlebar can confirm "--spawn_strategy=standalone" does not fix the problem, this might be a different issue.
